snippet: Mr. Fang’s advocacy of economic and democratic freedoms shaped the brief era of student dissent in China that ended with the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and his exile.
abstract: Fang Lizhi, whose advocacy of economic and democratic freedoms shaped China's brief era of student dissent that ended with the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and his exile, dies at age 76.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fang’s advocacy of economic and democratic freedoms shaped the brief era of student dissent in China that ended with the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and his exile.

headline.seo: Fang Lizhi, Chinese Physicist and Dissident, Dies at 76
headline.main: Fang Lizhi, Chinese Physicist and Seminal Dissident, Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Fang Lizhi, Lodestar of Chinese Dissidents, Dies at 76
